test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: Login to the application using Selenium and retrieve the cookie.

test-method.name: getLocalizationValid
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/localization' endpoint using a valid authentication cookie 2. Verify that the response is parsed into a CustomResponse object with language and dateFormat fields extracted from the 'data' section 3. Assert that both 'language' and 'dateFormat' fields are not null and not empty 4. Validate that the test method implementation uses required RestAssured keywords using the TestCodeValidator 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and all required fields are present as per validation logic

test-method.name: getActiveLanguages
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages?limit=50&offset=0&sortOrder=ASC&activeOnly=true' endpoint using a valid cookie 2. Parse the response using a CustomResponse object, extracting 'id', 'name', and 'code' fields from each entry in the 'data' array 3. Print the customResponse status code, body, and extracted language fields for debugging 4. Assert that the extracted lists of IDs, names, and codes are not empty and contain no null entries 5. Validate that the method is implemented using required RestAssured calls using TestCodeValidator 6. Assert that the response contains all expected fields and the status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getDashboardShortcuts
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/shortcuts' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Parse the response using CustomResponse to extract relevant shortcut fields like leave.assign_leave, leave.leave_list, etc. 3. Print the customResponse status code, response body, and extracted fields for verification 4. Assert that all extracted lists are not empty and contain expected shortcut information 5. Assert that the customResponse status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getAuthProviders
test-method.description: 1. Create a new OpenID provider using POST to ensure data exists for validation 2. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/auth/openid-providers?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 3. Parse the response using CustomResponse to extract fields like id, providerName, providerUrl, status, and clientId 4. Print the status code, response body, and all extracted fields for verification 5. Assert that none of the extracted lists are empty or contain null values 6. Assert that the customResponse status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getAdminOAuthList
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/oauth-clients?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Parse the response using CustomResponse to extract id, name, adminId, redirectUri, enabled, and confidential fields 3. Print the status code, response body, and extracted fields 4. Assert that all extracted lists are non-empty and contain non-null values 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getEmployeeList
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees?limit=50&offset=0&model=detailed&includeEmployees=onlyCurrent&sortField=employee.firstName&sortOrder=ASC' with a valid cookie 2. Extract fields like empNumber, firstName, and lastName from the response 3. Print status code, response body, and extracted employee details 4. Assert that the lists are not empty and contain non-null values 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: putLanguagePackage
test-method.description: 1. Fetch a language package ID not present in the current list (less than 450) 2. Send a PUT request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages/{lang_package_id}' with valid cookie and body 3. Print the language ID used, status code, and full response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and key fields (id, name, code) are non-empty

test-method.name: deleteLangById
test-method.description: 1. Fetch the first available language ID to delete and construct the request body 2. Send a DELETE request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages' endpoint with valid cookie and request body 3. Print the request body, status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and implementation is correct

test-method.name: putModulesSettings
test-method.description: 1. Create a request body with boolean values representing module states 2. Send a PUT request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/modules' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body 3. Print the request body, status code, and response body for verification 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and implementation is correct

test-method.name: postOpenIdProvide
test-method.description: 1. Create a request body with required fields: {name, url, clientId, clientSecret} and use a unique name 2. Send a POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/auth/openid-providers' with a valid cookie and request body 3. Print the request body, response status code, and body for debugging 4. Assert that the status code is 200 and response contains expected fields
